select t_depot_item.header_id, group_concat(concat(t_material.name,' ',ifnull(t_material.standard,''),' ', ifnull(t_material.model,''),' ',ifnull(t_material.color,''))) as materialsList from t_depot_item left join t_material on t_depot_item.material_id = t_material.Id and ifnull(t_material.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where 1=1
and t_depot_item.header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(t_depot_item.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by t_depot_item.header_id

select header_id, sum(oper_number) materialCount from t_depot_item where 1=1
and header_id in
#{item}
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by header_id

select dh.link_number number, ifnull(sum(dh.deposit),0) finishDeposit from t_depot_head dh where 1=1
and dh.link_number in
#{item}
and ifnull(dh.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by dh.link_number
select count(s.id) from t_depot_head dh left join t_serial_number s on dh.number=s.in_bill_no where dh.number = #{number} and (s.out_bill_no is not null or s.out_bill_no!='')
select ifnull(sum(dh.total_price),0) allPrice from t_depot_head dh where dh.organ_id=#{organId} and dh.type = '出库' and dh.sub_type = '零售' and dh.pay_type = '预付款' and ifnull(dh.delete_flag,'0') !='1'
